attributes.action: Set an agenda for constitutional and electoral reform.
attributes.background: The EU referendum has exposed deep distrust between the people and their elected representatives. To restore confidence in our democracy and ensure continued stability, the government must set an agenda for bold and far reaching constitutional reform.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what kind of constitutional reform you would like to see.
